review: I’m extremely satisfied with the Hercules DS536B Baritone and Alto/Tenor Sax Stand. The sturdiness and stability of the stand are top-notch, ensuring my instruments are safe and secure. The adjustable height and the ability to hold multiple instruments make it incredibly versatile. The swivel legs and folding design are a plus for easy storage and transport. The professional appearance and build quality are exactly what I expect from a premium stand. Despite the slight weight, it’s a small price to pay for such reliability and functionality. Highly recommend!
